anyOf.description: The type of item to reference. Always `item_reference`.

id.description: The ID of the item to reference.

oneOf.title: Item reference
oneOf.description: An internal identifier for an item to reference.

anyOf.description: The unique ID of this reasoning item.

type.description: The item type. Always `reasoning`.
The content type. Always `summary_text`.

summary.description: Reasoning summary content associated with this item.

anyOf.description: An encrypted representation of the reasoning content.
The unique ID of this message item.

type.description: The item type. Always `message`.
The type of the input item. Always `input_text`.

text.description: The text input to the model.

oneOf.title: Input text
oneOf.description: A text input to the model.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_image`.

anyOf.description: The URL of the image to be sent to the model. A fully qualified URL or base64 encoded image in a data URL.

x-enumDescriptions.high: Allows the model to "see" a higher-resolution version of the image, usually increasing input token costs.
x-enumDescriptions.low: Restricts the model to a lower-resolution version of the image.

allOf.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

oneOf.title: Input image
oneOf.description: An image input to the model. Learn about [image inputs](/docs/guides/vision)

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_file`.

anyOf.description: The name of the file to be sent to the model.
The base64-encoded data of the file to be sent to the model.
The URL of the file to be sent to the model.

oneOf.description: A file input to the model.

content.description: The message content, as an array of content parts.

role.description: The role of the message author. Always `assistant`.

The citation type. Always `url_citation`.

start_index.description: The index of the first character of the citation in the message.

end_index.description: The index of the last character of the citation in the message.

url.description: The URL of the cited resource.

title.description: The title of the cited resource.

annotations.description: Citations associated with the text content.

type.description: The content type. Always `refusal`.

items.description: A piece of assistant message content, such as text or a refusal.

content.description: The message content, as an array of content parts.

The unique ID of this function tool call.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call generated by the model.

type.description: The item type. Always `function_call`.

name.description: The name of the function to call.

arguments.description: The function arguments as a JSON string.

x-enumDescriptions.completed: Model has finished sampling this item.
x-enumDescriptions.in_progress: Model is currently sampling this item.
x-enumDescriptions.incomplete: Model was interrupted from sampling this item partway through. This can occur, for example, if the model encounters a stop token or exhausts its output_token budget.

allOf.description: The status of the function tool call.

anyOf.description: The unique ID of the function tool call output. Populated when this item is returned via API.

call_id.description: The unique ID of the function tool call generated by the model.

type.description: The type of the function tool call output. Always `function_call_output`.

oneOf.description: A JSON string of the output of the function tool call.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_text`.

text.description: The text input to the model.

oneOf.title: Input text
oneOf.description: A text input to the model.

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_image`.

anyOf.description: The URL of the image to be sent to the model. A fully qualified URL or base64 encoded image in a data URL.

x-enumDescriptions.high: Allows the model to "see" a higher-resolution version of the image, usually increasing input token costs.
x-enumDescriptions.low: Restricts the model to a lower-resolution version of the image.

allOf.description: The detail level of the image to be sent to the model. One of `high`, `low`, or `auto`. Defaults to `auto`.

oneOf.title: Input image
oneOf.description: An image input to the model. Learn about [image inputs](/docs/guides/vision)

type.description: The type of the input item. Always `input_file`.

anyOf.description: The name of the file to be sent to the model.
The base64-encoded data of the file to be sent to the model.
The URL of the file to be sent to the model.

oneOf.title: Input file
oneOf.description: A file input to the model.
A content block representing a video input to the model.

type.description: The type of the input content. Always `input_video`.

video_url.description: A base64 or remote url that resolves to a video file.

items.description: A piece of message content, such as text, an image, or a file.

oneOf.description: An array of content outputs (text, image, file) for the function tool call.

output.description: Text, image, or file output of the function tool call.

x-enumDescriptions.completed: Model has finished sampling this item.
x-enumDescriptions.in_progress: Model is currently sampling this item.
x-enumDescriptions.incomplete: Model was interrupted from sampling this item partway through. This can occur, for example, if the model encounters a stop token or exhausts its output_token budget.

allOf.description: The status of the item. One of `in_progress`, `completed`, or `incomplete`. Populated when items are returned via API.

oneOf.title: Function tool call output
oneOf.description: The output of a function tool call.
